@@ -164,0 +179,5 @@
+        // Older kernels do not have reliable madvise tag for this test to work
+        if (Platform.isLinux() && Platform.getOsVersionMajor() <= 4) {
+            throw new SkippedException("Skipped for kernel: " + Platform.getOsVersion());
+        }
